text: Eva Colas (born 21 October 1996 in Bastia) is a French model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss France 2018 1st Runner-Up. She represented her country at Miss Universe 2018 pageant in Bangkok, Thailand. == Personal life == Colas was born and raised in Bastia, Corsica. She is a student of Wealth Management in Paris-Dauphine University. She graduated in 2014 with a Baccalaureate with the highest honors. == Pageantry == === Miss France 2018 === Colas represented Corse and was crowned as 1st Runner-up at Miss France 2018 that was held on 16 December 2017 and she was appointed as Miss Universe France 2018 at M.A.CH 36 in Châteauroux, Centre-Val de Loire. === Miss Universe 2018 === The real winner of the 2018 edition of Miss France, Maëva Coucke chose to compete at Miss World 2018 so the 1st runner-up, Eva Colas, was appointed as Miss Universe France. Colas represented France at Miss Universe 2018 pageant in Bangkok, Thailand where she did not place in the Top 20. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:French people of Corsican descent Category:French beauty pageant winners Category:1996 births Category:People from Bastia Category:French female models Category:Miss Universe 2018 contestants
title: Eva Colas
